set(THIS_PROJECT CryAudioImplFmod)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_HeaderFiles
	ATLEntities_fmod.h
	AudioEventData_fmod.h
	AudioImplCVars_fmod.h
	AudioImpl_fmod.h
	AudioObjectData_fmod.h
	Common_fmod.h
	resource.h
	stdafx.h
)
source_group("Header Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles})


set (SourceGroup_Root
	stdafx.cpp
)


set (SourceGroup_SourceFiles
	AudioEventData_fmod.cpp
	AudioImplCVars_fmod.cpp
	AudioImpl_fmod.cpp
	AudioObjectData_fmod.cpp
	Common_fmod.cpp
	CryAudioImpl_fmod.cpp
)
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(CryAudioImpl_fmod_uber_0_cpp ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles} ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles}  )
enable_unity_build( "CryAudioImpl_fmod_uber_0.cpp" CryAudioImpl_fmod_uber_0_cpp )

set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${CryAudioImpl_fmod_uber_0_cpp}
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

include_directories( ../../Common )
include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/Audio )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SOURCES})


USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "stdafx.h" "stdafx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
